string-array.name: bigtext1
string-array.item: Click PAUSE button on home page to stop counting and click the resume button to begin again. Please have the phone on hand while walking

string-array.name: bigtext2
string-array.item: Pedometer may be forcibly stopped due to limitation of some devices

string-array.name: bigtext3
string-array.item:
Shaking the phone could lead to additional steps being counted. This is as a result of the built-in sensor
The team will keep working to make sure you have a fantastic user experience

string-array.name: bigtext4
string-array.item: In some circumstances, because of the conditions you are driving in and the location of your phone, some steps may be counted. If this persists, the best solution is to pause the step counter while taking a long drive

string-array.name: bigtext5
string-array.item: The built-in sensor of the device in the phone is used to count your steps. Accuracy is based on how good the sensor is

string-array.name: bigtext6
string-array.item: Best places are to keep your phone in your bag, hand and pocket. Do not put it too far from the body or shake too fast or in places with little to no movement

string-array.name: bigtext7
string-array.item: The steps are read from the built-in sensor and not the GPS tracker. You can pause to save battery if you feel concerned

string-array.name: bigtext8
string-array.item: Completely Private. No personal data collected or shared with 3rd party outfits

string-array.name: bigtext9
string-array.item: Height and weight are used to calculate burned calories and distance. Accurate information is advised

string-array.name: bigtext10
string-array.item: We help you set your step goal according to your achieved steps to keep you motivated.
